desc: WHAT IS A VIRTUAL RACE? A virtual race is a race that can be run (or walked) from any location you choose. You can run, jog, or walk on the road, on the trail, on the treadmill, at the gym or on the track (or even at another race). You get to run your own race, at your own pace.

layout.text: RUN FOR A CAUSE, NOT THE APPLAUSE!
CHOOSE YOUR EVENT, RUN/WALK/BIKE/JOG OR TREADMILL AT YOUR PACE. LOG YOUR RESULTS AND RECEIVE YOUR MEDAL. EACH REGISTRATION RECEIVES A CUSTOM BIB AND MEDAL.
